Metadata.PublisherMessage: Windows Mobile Broadband Class Driver Event Provider for OPN

Event.Message: Sending command MessageType: %1, MessageLength: %2, MessageTransactionId: %3, TotalFragments: %4, CurrentFragment: %5, ServiceId: %6, CommandId: %7, CommandType: %8, InformationBufferLength: %9, InformationBuffer: %10
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageTransactionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TotalFragments" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentFragment" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ServiceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CommandId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CommandType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBufferLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="InformationBufferLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Receiving command done MessageType: %1, MessageLength: %2, MessageTransactionId: %3, TotalFragments: %4, CurrentFragment: %5, ServiceId: %6, CommandId: %7, Status: %8, InformationBufferLength: %9, InformationBuffer: %10
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageTransactionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TotalFragments" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentFragment" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ServiceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CommandId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBufferLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="InformationBufferLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Receiving indication MessageType: %1, MessageLength: %2, MessageTransactionId: %3, TotalFragments: %4, CurrentFragment: %5, ServiceId: %6, CommandId: %7, InformationBufferLength: %8, InformationBuffer: %9
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageTransactionId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TotalFragments" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentFragment" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ServiceId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="CommandId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBufferLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="InformationBufferLength"/> </template>
